mapper.select: SELECT *,( 6371 * acos ( cos ( radians(#{lat}) ) * cos( radians( lat ) ) * cos( radians( lng ) - radians(#{lng}) ) + sin ( radians(#{lat}) ) * sin( radians( lat ) ) ) ) AS distance -- //距离 FROM userinfo -- HAVING distance > 0 -- //筛选距离小于2km的商家(可不写)，如果没查到数据就是没有小于2km的商家 ORDER BY distance -- //根据距离远近来排序 默认升序 （可不写） LIMIT 0 , 20; -- //显示前20条数据（可不写）
mapper.sql: uid, userid, countryid, pid, cid, zid, uname, upass, mobile, email, photo, lng, lat, qq, regdate, isopen, islock, mobilebundle, emailbundle, isdelete, name, idcard, sex, age, birthday, introduce, score, coin, cash, livestatus, bak1, bak2, bak3
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from userinfo
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into userinfo (uid, userid, countryid, pid, cid, zid, uname, upass, mobile, email, photo, lng, lat, qq, regdate, isopen, islock, mobilebundle, emailbundle, isdelete, name, idcard, sex, age, birthday, introduce, score, coin, cash, livestatus, bak1, bak2, bak3) values (#{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{upass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lng,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{lat,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regdate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{isopen,jdbcType=BIT}, #{islock,jdbcType=BIT}, #{mobilebundle,jdbcType=BIT}, #{emailbundle,jdbcType=BIT}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=BIT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=BIT}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{birthday,jdbcType=DATE}, #{introduce,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coin,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cash,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{livestatus,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{bak1,jdbcType=BIT}, #{bak2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bak3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

userid = #{record.userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
countryid = #{record.countryid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
